fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Foretell a catastrophic event that will happen.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, tell the host a catastrophe to foretell. You specify what happens in the catastrophe
- The next day, the host will announce that a Doomsayer has announced a catastrophe.
- The next night, the catastrophe happens, applying whatever effects you predicted.
- During a catastrophe, you will hide in your bunker, giving you basic defense and making you immune to the effects of the catastrophe.

fields.name: Limits to catastrophe:
fields.value:
- Cannot kill more than 2 people.
- Can not make anyone be unable to win/unable to lose.
- Can only revive 2 people.
- The targets of the catastrophe will always be random.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see 2 catastrophes take place.
